response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for us at $1,200,000. Considering its immense worth and potential benefits for you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price tailored for you. My proposal is to offer this remarkable product to you for $950,000. This represents an exceptional opportunity for you to secure such a valuable asset at a highly favorable rate. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
